Room.Name: Outside The East Gate
Room.Description: A grand and imposing city entrance, with large black marble pillars on either side of the gate, which has a small golden emblem embedded within it. The use of black and gold in the description suggests a sense of opulence and grandeur.

Room.Name: The East Gate of Astoria
Room.Description: A grand and imposing city entrance, with large black marble pillars on either side of the gate, which has a small golden emblem embedded within it. The use of black and gold in the description suggests a sense of opulence and grandeur.

Exit.Description: The road continues to the west.

Room.Name: Eastern Street of Astoria
Room.Description: Ancient cobblestones line the street which creates an odd tempo of clacks and thumps as horse-drawn wagons pass by, bringing merchandise and wares to various merchants and vendors within the city. The road continues east and west.

Exit.Description: The road continues to the east.
The road continues to the west.

Room.Name: Eastern Street of Astoria
Room.Description: Ancient cobblestones line the street which creates an odd tempo of clacks and thumps as horse-drawn wagons pass by, bringing merchandise and wares to various merchants and vendors within the city. The road continues east and west.

Exit.Description: The road continues to the east.
The road continues to a four way intersection to the west.

Room.Name: Eastern Street of Astoria
Room.Description: Ancient cobblestones line this four way street which creates an odd tempo of clacks and thumps as horse-drawn wagons pass by, bringing merchandise and wares to various merchants and vendors within the city.

Exit.Description: Communer Lane begins to the north.
The road continues to the east.
The road continues to the west.

Room.Name: Eastern Street of Astoria
Room.Description: Ancient cobblestones line the street which creates an odd tempo of clacks and thumps as horse-drawn wagons pass by, bringing merchandise and wares to various merchants and vendors within the city. The road continues east and west.

Room.Name: Eastern Street of Astoria
Room.Description: Ancient cobblestones line the street which creates an odd tempo of clacks and thumps as horse-drawn wagons pass by, bringing merchandise and wares to various merchants and vendors within the city. The road continues east and west.

Room.Name: The Gazebo
Room.Description: Ancient cobblestones line the street of this giant gazebo, supported by massive columns in each of the four corners. One of the busiest intersections of town, the lound sound of clacks and thumps as horse-drawn wagons pass by, bringing merchandise and wares to various merchants, vendors and temples within the city.

Room.Name: Western Street of Astoria
Room.Description: Ancient cobblestones line the street which creates an odd tempo of clacks and thumps as horse-drawn wagons pass by, bringing merchandise and wares to various merchants and vendors within the city. The road continues east and west.

Room.Name: Western Street of Astoria
Room.Description: Ancient cobblestones line the street which creates an odd tempo of clacks and thumps as horse-drawn wagons pass by, bringing merchandise and wares to various merchants and vendors within the city. The road continues east and west.

Room.Name: Western Street of Astoria
Room.Description: Ancient cobblestones line this four way street which creates an odd tempo of clacks and thumps as horse-drawn wagons pass by, bringing merchandise and wares to various merchants and vendors within the city.

Room.Name: Western Street of Astoria
Room.Description: Ancient cobblestones line the street which creates an odd tempo of clacks and thumps as horse-drawn wagons pass by, bringing merchandise and wares to various merchants and vendors within the city. The road continues east and west.

Room.Name: Western Street of Astoria
Room.Description: Ancient cobblestones line the street which creates an odd tempo of clacks and thumps as horse-drawn wagons pass by, bringing merchandise and wares to various merchants and vendors within the city. The road continues east and west.

Room.Name: Western Gate
Room.Description: A grand and imposing city entrance, with large black marble pillars on either side of the gate, which has a small golden emblem embedded within it. The use of black and gold in the description suggests a sense of opulence and grandeur.

Exit.Description: Through the western gate of Astoria.

Room.Name: Outside the Western Gate
Room.Description: A grand and imposing city entrance, with large black marble pillars on either side of the gate, which has a small golden emblem embedded within it. The use of black and gold in the description suggests a sense of opulence and grandeur.

Room.Name: Communer Lane
Room.Description: Magical spheres of light replace street lamps here, illuminating the pathway almost as well as the high-noon sun. Some strange etchings appear on various walls and windowsills, like some secret language revealing a higher knowledge of things beyond understanding. The lane continues to the north.

Room.Name: Communer Lane
Room.Description: Magical spheres of light replace street lamps here, illuminating the pathway almost as well as the high-noon sun. Some strange etchings appear on various walls and windowsills, like some secret language revealing a higher knowledge of things beyond understanding. The lane continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: Communer Lane
Room.Description: Magical spheres of light replace street lamps here, illuminating the pathway almost as well as the high-noon sun. Some strange etchings appear on various walls and windowsills, like some secret language revealing a higher knowledge of things beyond understanding. The lane continues north and south, the priest to the east.

Room.Name: Communer Lane
Room.Description: Magical spheres of light replace street lamps here, illuminating the pathway almost as well as the high-noon sun. Some strange etchings appear on various walls and windowsills, like some secret language revealing a higher knowledge of things beyond understanding. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Communer Lane
Room.Description: Magical spheres of light replace street lamps here, illuminating the pathway almost as well as the high-noon sun. Some strange etchings appear on various walls and windowsills, like some secret language revealing a higher knowledge of things beyond understanding. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Communer Lane
Room.Description: Magical spheres of light replace street lamps here, illuminating the pathway almost as well as the high-noon sun. Some strange etchings appear on various walls and windowsills, like some secret language revealing a higher knowledge of things beyond understanding. The lane continues north and south, the paladin's guild lies to the east.

Room.Name: Communer Lane
Room.Description: Magical spheres of light replace street lamps here, illuminating the pathway almost as well as the high-noon sun. Some strange etchings appear on various walls and windowsills, like some secret language revealing a higher knowledge of things beyond understanding. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Communer Lane
Room.Description: Magical spheres of light replace street lamps here, illuminating the pathway almost as well as the high-noon sun. Some strange etchings appear on various walls and windowsills, like some secret language revealing a higher knowledge of things beyond understanding. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Communer Lane
Room.Description: Magical spheres of light replace street lamps here, illuminating the pathway almost as well as the high-noon sun. Some strange etchings appear on various walls and windowsills, like some secret language revealing a higher knowledge of things beyond understanding. The lane continues north and south, the healers guild lies to the east.

Room.Name: Wendy's Shop of Magic
Room.Description: Bells ring as you enter the shop, signaling the owner a patron has entered. A long smooth counter lines one wall of the room, clear of all clutter except for a large crystal ball. Strange devices hang from hooks in the ceiling along one wall, while the other side is lined with shelves containing various plants and shrubs.

Room.Name: The Shamans Guild
Room.Description: Walking into this extravegant looking guild, the first thing that you notice is a small shrine in the middle of the room. Its the Shrine of the Great Shamans Guild. The floor is made of solid wood and is coverd in a huge blue rug thathas pictures of chalices and crosses on it. In the middle of the where the shrine sits is a medium whie cloth with a shield and two swords crossing the shield, sitting underneath the shine.

Room.Name: The Paladins Guild
Room.Description: Walking into this dreary looking guild, the first thing that you notice is a small modest shrine in the middle of the room, representing all paladins who have trained and died fighting in the defense of others. Beneath the shrine is a purple cloth embeded with a sword and shield, the symbol of traditional defense of the innocent. The floor is made of solid wood and is worn smooth with various notches from all the sword practice.

Room.Name: The Healers Sanctuary
Room.Description: Walking into this guild, the first thing that you notice is the smell of disinfectant and incense. A small modest shrine in the middle of the room, where various scented candles burn, creating a relaxing atmosphere for healing. The floor is made of solid wood and is waxed and buffed to a mirror-like shine.

Room.Name: The Priests Guidance
Room.Description: The extravagance of this room is intense to say the least. Gaudy chandeliers of gold and silver hang from the vaulted ceiling all lit with fragrant candles made with gold flecks within the wax. An elder is here dressed in all white, with a blue emblem upon her chest depicting a chalice and cross. No expense was spared to display an arrogance of superiority and position of the elder here.

Room.Name: Dummy Room
Room.Description: Within these walls are dummys lined up ready to practice your many skills on.

Room.Name: The Paladins Guidance
Room.Description: You see one single elder here sitting on a cold stone chair, completely lacking any cushion for comfort. While still gripping his ancient sword and shield, you can't help but notice the scars across both his face and forearms. Symbols of campaigns to rescue the innocent fill the single mural on the wall.

Room.Name: Dummy Room
Room.Description: Within these walls are dummys lined up ready to practice your many skills on.

Room.Name: The Healers Guidance
Room.Description: You see a multitude of elders perched on comfortable cushioned chairs, surrounding the outside walls of the room. Symbols of snakes and other wildlife fill the murals on the walls above the elders, all depicting various stages of healing or death. The elders invite you to aks your questions without delay, so they may get back to their contemplations.

Room.Name: Dummy Room
Room.Description: Within these walls are dummys lined up ready to practice your many skills on.

Room.Name: Adventurers Lane
Room.Description: This clean cobblestone street shows little wear. Less used by wagons or merchants, due to the lack of shops along the lane. The lane continues south.

Room.Name: Adventurers Lane
Room.Description: This clean cobblestone street shows little wear. Less used by wagons or merchants, due to the lack of shops along the lane. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Adventurers Lane
Room.Description: This clean cobblestone street shows little wear. Less used by wagons or merchants, due to the lack of shops along the lane. The lane continues north and south. To the east you see a guild.

Room.Name: Adventurers Lane
Room.Description: This clean cobblestone street shows little wear. Less used by wagons or merchants, due to the lack of shops along the lane. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Adventurers Lane
Room.Description: This clean cobblestone street shows little wear. Less used by wagons or merchants, due to the lack of shops along the lane. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Adventurers Lane
Room.Description: This clean cobblestone street shows little wear. Less used by wagons or merchants, due to the lack of shops along the lane. The lane continues north and south. To the east you see a guild.

Room.Name: Adventurers Lane
Room.Description: This clean cobblestone street shows little wear. Less used by wagons or merchants, due to the lack of shops along the lane. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Adventurers Lane
Room.Description: This clean cobblestone street shows little wear. Less used by wagons or merchants, due to the lack of shops along the lane. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Adventurers Lane
Room.Description: This clean cobblestone street shows little wear. Less used by wagons or merchants, due to the lack of shops along the lane. The lane continues north and south. To the east you see a guild.

Room.Name: Adventurers Lane
Room.Description: This clean cobblestone street shows little wear. Less used by wagons or merchants, due to the lack of shops along the lane. The lane continues north, but evidence shows work being done to continue the lane further.

Room.Name: Warriors Guild
Room.Description: All the walls here are lined with padding, each corner featuring a weapon rack full of implements of various specialties. The floor looks to be swept and mopped often, yet old sweat and blood stains have set in from the years of hard work and practice.

Room.Name: Thiefs Guild
Room.Description: Entry into this room is by invitation only. A large sign at the entrance lists 10 rules you can never break, the first of which states "Death to any who break 3 or more of the following rules!" Full sized statues wearing various types of clothing are arranged throughout the room, many a thief practicing their pick pocket skills.

Room.Name: Guard Station
Room.Description: A small, fortified structure is used to schedule guard rotation. The shack is located out of the way so as to not intrude on the citizens of Astoria.

Room.Name: Warriors Training
Room.Description: In a small room with few decorations an old yet hard muscled man sits, waiting to approve or disaprove advancement within the guild. A podium stands beside the trainer, with the book open to your name, along side an ink pot and pen.

Room.Name: Dummy Room
Room.Description: Within these walls are dummys lined up ready to practice your many skills on.

Room.Name: Thiefs Guidance
Room.Description: A luxuriously furished room is filled with well dressed men and women, enjoying drinks and snacks, much like what you would expect at a party. An old wrinkled man hides in the shadows of a corner, waiting for students to complete their test to prove they are worthy to advance.

Room.Name: Dummy Room
Room.Description: Within these walls are dummys lined up ready to practice your many skills on.

Room.Name: Guard Shack
Room.Description: A small, fortified structure is used to schedule guard rotation. The shack is located out of the way so as to not intrude on the citizens of Astoria.

Room.Name: dummy room
Room.Description: Within these walls are dummys lined up ready to practice your many skills on.

Room.Name: Ryhmers Path
Room.Description: The road is surrounded by trees and brush with a variety of wildlife adding to the symphony of sounds in the air. The scent of blooming flowers and freshly cut grass mixes with the natural scents of the forest. The rustling of leaves, chirping of birds, and occasional calls of animals create a harmonious rhythm in the surroundings. The beauty of nature can be seen and heard with every step, making the journey all the more worthwhile. The road continues north and south.

Room.Name: Rhymers Path
Room.Description: The road is surrounded by trees and brush with a variety of wildlife adding to the symphony of sounds in the air. The scent of blooming flowers and freshly cut grass mixes with the natural scents of the forest. The rustling of leaves, chirping of birds, and occasional calls of animals create a harmonious rhythm in the surroundings. The beauty of nature can be seen and heard with every step, making the journey all the more worthwhile. The road continues north and south.

Room.Name: Rhymers Path
Room.Description: The road is surrounded by trees and brush with a variety of wildlife adding to the symphony of sounds in the air. The scent of blooming flowers and freshly cut grass mixes with the natural scents of the forest. The rustling of leaves, chirping of birds, and occasional calls of animals create a harmonious rhythm in the surroundings. The beauty of nature can be seen and heard with every step, making the journey all the more worthwhile. The road continues north and south, and a guild lies to the west.

Room.Name: Rhymers Path
Room.Description: The road is surrounded by trees and brush with a variety of wildlife adding to the symphony of sounds in the air. The scent of blooming flowers and freshly cut grass mixes with the natural scents of the forest. The rustling of leaves, chirping of birds, and occasional calls of animals create a harmonious rhythm in the surroundings. The beauty of nature can be seen and heard with every step, making the journey all the more worthwhile. The road continues north and south.

The rustling of leaves, chirping of birds, and occasional calls of animals create a harmonious rhythm in the surroundings. The beauty of nature can be seen and heard with every step, making the journey all the more worthwhile. The road continues north and south.

The rustling of leaves, chirping of birds, and occasional calls of animals create a harmonious rhythm in the surroundings. The beauty of nature can be seen and heard with every step, making the journey all the more worthwhile. The road continues north and south, and a guild lies to the west.

The scent of blooming flowers and freshly cut grass mixes with the natural scents of the forest. The rustling of leaves, chirping of birds, and occasional calls of animals create a harmonious rhythm in the surroundings. The beauty of nature can be seen and heard with every step, making the journey all the more worthwhile. The road continues north and south.

Room.Name: Rhymers Path
Room.Description: The road is surrounded by trees and brush with a variety of wildlife adding to the symphony of sounds in the air. The scent of blooming flowers and freshly cut grass mixes with the natural scents of the forest. The rustling of leaves, chirping of birds, and occasional calls of animals create a harmonious rhythm in the surroundings. The beauty of nature can be seen and heard with every step, making the journey all the more worthwhile. The road continues north and south, or you could jump down into a river.

Room.Name: Inside the South Gate
Room.Description: A grand and imposing city entrance, with large black marble pillars on either side of the gate, which has a small golden emblem embedded within it. The use of black and gold in the description suggests a sense of opulence and grandeur.

Room.Name: Outside the South Gate
Room.Description: A grand and imposing city entrance, with large black marble pillars on either side of the gate, which has a small golden emblem embedded within it. The use of black and gold in the description suggests a sense of opulence and grandeur.

Room.Name: Bards Guild
Room.Description: A giant peg board lines three of the four walls of this room, multiple hooks holding every kind of musical instrument you can imagine. To either side of the north door, wooden racks stand from floor to ceiling hold the larger contraptions that are too heavy to carry.

Room.Name: Bards Guidance
Room.Description: The walls of this room are lined with heavy wool strips pleated and sewn together, with a thick coating of tree sap and bees wax. Upon entering, you realize that the acoustics here are superb. An ancient man is here, waiting on you to begin your audition.

Room.Name: Dummy Room
Room.Description: Within these walls are dummys lined up ready to practice your many skills on.

Room.Name: hollow tree
Room.Description: You have stepped into a huge, hollow tree. Despite the large area hollowed out, the living tree seems health and strong. The inner cavity is covered in thick bark, protecting itself from it's intruders. Thick grass mixed with moss line the ground, making it a comfortable place to take a rest.

Room.Name: hollow tree
Room.Description: You have stepped further into the hollow tree. The inner cavity here is also covered in thick bark, protecting itself from intruders. Thick grass mixed with moss line the ground, making it a comfortable place to take a rest.

Room.Name: Dummy Room
Room.Description: Within these walls are dummys lined up ready to practice your many skills on.

Room.Name: Soothsayer Lane
Room.Description: The road here is paved with an assortment of crystals and gems of all shapes sizes, gaps between each filled with a fine powder, and a final overlay of clear shellac. Much less traveled than others in the city, the atmosphere of this lane vibrates with a strange occult sensation. The lane continues north.

Room.Name: Soothsayer Lane
Room.Description: The road here is paved with an assortment of crystals and gems of all shapes sizes, gaps between each filled with a fine powder, and a final overlay of clear shellac. Much less traveled than others in the city, the atmosphere of this lane vibrates with a strange occult sensation. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Soothsayer Lane
Room.Description: The road here is paved with an assortment of crystals and gems of all shapes sizes, gaps between each filled with a fine powder, and a final overlay of clear shellac. Much less traveled than others in the city, the atmosphere of this lane vibrates with a strange occult sensation. The lane continues north and south, a guild lies to the west.

Room.Name: Soothsayer Lane
Room.Description: The road here is paved with an assortment of crystals and gems of all shapes sizes, gaps between each filled with a fine powder, and a final overlay of clear shellac. Much less traveled than others in the city, the atmosphere of this lane vibrates with a strange occult sensation. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Soothsayer Lane
Room.Description: The road here is paved with an assortment of crystals and gems of all shapes sizes, gaps between each filled with a fine powder, and a final overlay of clear shellac. Much less traveled than others in the city, the atmosphere of this lane vibrates with a strange occult sensation. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Soothsayer Lane
Room.Description: The road here is paved with an assortment of crystals and gems of all shapes sizes, gaps between each filled with a fine powder, and a final overlay of clear shellac. Much less traveled than others in the city, the atmosphere of this lane vibrates with a strange occult sensation. The lane continues north and south, a guild lies to the west.

Room.Name: Soothsayer Lane
Room.Description: The road here is paved with an assortment of crystals and gems of all shapes sizes, gaps between each filled with a fine powder, and a final overlay of clear shellac. Much less traveled than others in the city, the atmosphere of this lane vibrates with a strange occult sensation. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Soothsayer Lane
Room.Description: The road here is paved with an assortment of crystals and gems of all shapes sizes, gaps between each filled with a fine powder, and a final overlay of clear shellac. Much less traveled than others in the city, the atmosphere of this lane vibrates with a strange occult sensation. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Soothsayer Lane
Room.Description: The road here is paved with an assortment of crystals and gems of all shapes sizes, gaps between each filled with a fine powder, and a final overlay of clear shellac. Much less traveled than others in the city, the atmosphere of this lane vibrates with a strange occult sensation. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Dead End
Room.Description: The road here is paved with an assortment of crystals and gems of all shapes sizes, gaps between each filled with a fine powder, and a final overlay of clear shellac. The lane ends here, a dead end but with further construction evident. The lane continues to the south.

Room.Name: Shapeshifters Guild
Room.Description: The entrance to the shapeshifters guild is an imposing stone archway, carved with intricate patterns and symbols that represent the shapeshifters' connection to nature and their ability to transform into various creatures. At the entrance, a high-level shapeshifter stands guard, their animal form radiating a sense of power and strength. The shapeshifter observes anyone who approaches, gauging their intentions and testing their respect for nature before allowing them entry.

Room.Name: Shapeshifter Guidance
Room.Description: As you enter the shapeshifters guild, you are greeted by air that is thick with the smell of wood burning in the fireplace, and the walls are lined with shelves filled with books on anatomy, biology, and animal behavior. The students can be seen in various forms, practicing their transformations in designated areas or studying in groups. There is a sense of harmony and tranquility within the guild, and the sounds of birds and other woodland creatures can be heard in the background.

Room.Name: Dummy Roon
Room.Description: Within these walls are dummys lined up ready to practice your many skills on.

Room.Name: Mages Guild
Room.Description: The walls of the mages guild are full of mystical symbols, none of which can be understood by the common mind. Several robed figures mill around discussing incomprehensible things with unintelligible words and hand motions.

Room.Name: Mages Guidance
Room.Description: As you enter this dark and silent room you hear a voice in your head asking you if you are worthy to learn new spells yet. Obviously, without the power to detect the invisible, it would feel as if the bodyless voice was from a spirit.

Room.Name: Dummy Roon
Room.Description: Within these walls are dummys lined up ready to practice your many skills on.

Room.Name: Temple Altar
Room.Description: A giant altar stands tall and gaudy in the middle of this room. There are various depictions of scenery etched into the altar, from the bloom of new life to the death of a star. No one god is represented here, but all gods of all faiths are welcome. The room is simple of fashion, all decorations designed to display the altar front and center.

Room.Name: Temple Bath
Room.Description: Smooth marble stones along the bath floor present a very real slip hazzard to worshipers who partake in the ceremonial bath celebrations.

Room.Name: Temple of the Sun
Room.Description: Brightly lit chandeliers hang from the vaulted ceiling, revealing all, forever vanquishing all shadows. Various cushioned benches line the walls for worshipers to kneel or pray as needed.

Room.Name: Temple of The Shadow
Room.Description: Dimly lit chandeliers hang from the vaulted ceiling, revealing very little, multiple shadows provide many hiding placesa. Various cushioned benches line the walls for worshipers to kneel or pray as needed.

Room.Name: Temple of The Moon
Room.Description: This temple room features a large dome window in the ceiling above. Without artificial lighting, the room is bathed completely in natural light from either the sun or the moon. Multiple mirrors are placed strategically in the upper corners to reflect the lesser moonlight at night, yet can be turned up and away during the daytime.

Room.Name: Merchants Lane
Room.Description: The road is made with solid rock fit tightly together. Wide enough for four wagons abreast, this is one lively street, merchants and hawkers line both sides of the street. The center of the street is humped, allowing rain to flow to the sides and into the gutters. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Merchants Lane
Room.Description: The road is made with solid rock fit tightly together. Wide enough for four wagons abreast, this is one lively street, merchants and hawkers line both sides of the street. The center of the street is humped, allowing rain to flow to the sides and into the gutters. The lane continues north and south, merchant shops lie to the east and the west.

Room.Name: Merchants Lane
Room.Description: The road is made with solid rock fit tightly together. Wide enough for four wagons abreast, this is one lively street, merchants and hawkers line both sides of the street. The center of the street is humped, allowing rain to flow to the sides and into the gutters. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Merchants Lane
Room.Description: The road is made with solid rock fit tightly together. Wide enough for four wagons abreast, this is one lively street, merchants and hawkers line both sides of the street. The center of the street is humped, allowing rain to flow to the sides and into the gutters. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Merchants Lane
Room.Description: The road is made with solid rock fit tightly together. Wide enough for four wagons abreast, this is one lively street, merchants and hawkers line both sides of the street. The center of the street is humped, allowing rain to flow to the sides and into the gutters. The lane continues north and south, merchant shops lie to the east and the west.

Room.Name: Merchants Lane
Room.Description: The road is made with solid rock fit tightly together. Wide enough for four wagons abreast, this is one lively street, merchants and hawkers line both sides of the street. The center of the street is humped, allowing rain to flow to the sides and into the gutters. The lane continues north and south.

Room.Name: Merchants Lane
Room.Description: The road is made with solid rock fit tightly together. Wide enough for four wagons abreast, this is one lively street, merchants and hawkers line both sides of the street. The center of the street is humped, allowing rain to flow to the sides and into the gutters. The lane continues north, merchant shops lie to the east and the west.

Room.Name: General Store
Room.Description: Clean and organized, this shop seems to have all the neccessary conveniences one may want as they travel and explore. From small kayaks, various sized sacks and canteens, You can be sure to find what you need.

Room.Name: Armory
Room.Description: The armory shop has tall, short, skinny and fat dummies for the display of chainmail and platemail armor. No matter your size or race, if you prefer your armor to be stiff and strong, this is the shop for you.

Room.Name: Tanners Shop
Room.Description: A sweet smell of cured leathers and skins fill the air here. Tables line the walls, displaying all the leathers in an organized manner. Brown, green, or even camouflage, all guarenteed to be water and sun resistant, perfect for all your outdoor travel needs.

Room.Name: Weavers and Woolens
Room.Description: This shop features many knitted garment samples on display, from the finest wooven silk to the bulky heavyweight winter garments needed for warmth. A sign on the wall states "All the items seen here are completely hand- stitched or hand-made. Our shop is expressly created to provide all your crocheted woolen needs."

Room.Name: Axe and Dagger
Room.Description: As you enter you notice a huge sign on the wall which states "We will not be held responsible for accidents or bloodshed within the establishment." Row upon row of smaller daggers and swords are displayed on open tables, weapon stands along the walls contain taller weapons such as staffs and polearms. All appear freshly sharpened and ready for immediate use.

Room.Name: Krolicks BBQ
Room.Description: As you walk in you hear lots of yelling from behind the counter. You see cooks and trainees working hard preparing all the custom orders received. Although many items on the menu include chicken or pork, all seem to be doused with the same, hot spicy bbq sauce that Krolicks is famous for.

Room.Name: The Trainer
Room.Description: You are in the room with the trainer. He has learned many valuable lessons to be shared with the endeavoring adventurer.

Room.Name: The Bank
Room.Description: Vaults line the eastern wall. Your belongings could be in any of them. A banker stands here to take your gold.

Room.Name: Park Avenue
Room.Description: This avenue is so pristine you could eat off the ground. Mansions line the road where the city leaders and the rich live. Multiple signs can be seen on both sides of the avenue, all stating rules about what can and can't be done, such as "Keep of the grass" or "Stay to the right."

Room.Name: Park Avenue
Room.Description: This avenue is so pristine you could eat off the ground. Mansions line the road where the city leaders and the rich live. Multiple signs can be seen on both sides of the avenue, all stating rules about what can and can't be done, such as "Keep of the grass" or "Stay to the right."

Room.Name: Park Avenue Intersection
Room.Description: This avenue is so pristine you could eat off the ground. Multiple signs can be seen on both sides of the avenue, all stating rules about what can and can't be done, such as "Keep of the grass" or "Stay to the right." Pearl Avenue lies to the north.

Room.Name: Pearl Avenue
Room.Description: This avenue is so pristine you could eat off the ground. Mansions line the road where the city leaders and the rich live. Multiple signs can be seen on both sides of the avenue, all stating rules about what can and can't be done, such as "Keep of the grass" or "Stay to the right."

Room.Name: Park Avenue
Room.Description: This avenue is so pristine you could eat off the ground. Mansions line the road where the city leaders and the rich live. Multiple signs can be seen on both sides of the avenue, all stating rules about what can and can't be done, such as "Keep of the grass" or "Stay to the right."

Room.Name: Park Avenue
Room.Description: This avenue is so pristine you could eat off the ground. Mansions line the road where the city leaders and the rich live. Multiple signs can be seen on both sides of the avenue, all stating rules about what can and can't be done, such as "Keep of the grass" or "Stay to the right.

Room.Name: Inside the North Gate
Room.Description: A grand and imposing city entrance, with large black marble pillars on either side of the gate, which has a small golden emblem embedded within it. The use of black and gold in the description suggests a sense of opulence and grandeur.

Room.Name: Outside the North Gate
Room.Description: A grand and imposing city entrance, with large black marble pillars on either side of the gate, which has a small golden emblem embedded within it. The use of black and gold in the description suggests a sense of opulence and grandeur.

Room.Name: Tigris River
Room.Description: The river narrows here, as it winds its way out of the city proper. A pleasent musty smell rises from the river water, no doubt from whatever chemical is used to clean and sanitize it this close to the city.

Room.Name: Tigris River
Room.Description: The river narrows here, as it winds its way out of the city proper. A pleasent musty smell rises from the river water, no doubt from whatever chemical is used to clean and sanitize it this close to the city.

Room.Name: Tigris River
Room.Description: The river narrows here, as it winds its way out of the city proper. A pleasent musty smell rises from the river water, no doubt from whatever chemical is used to clean and sanitize it this close to the city.

Room.Name: Tigris River
Room.Description: The river narrows here, as it winds its way out of the city proper. A pleasent musty smell rises from the river water, no doubt from whatever chemical is used to clean and sanitize it this close to the city.

Room.Name: Tigris River
Room.Description: The river narrows here, as it winds its way out of the city proper. A pleasent musty smell rises from the river water, no doubt from whatever chemical is used to clean and sanitize it this close to the city.

Room.Name: Tigris River
Room.Description: The river narrows here, as it winds its way out of the city proper. A pleasent musty smell rises from the river water, no doubt from whatever chemical is used to clean and sanitize it this close to the city.

Room.Name: Assassins Guild
Room.Description: You see a dimly lit space with thick stone walls, narrow passageways, and alcoves for concealment. The atmosphere is hushed, and the only sounds are the occasional murmur of whispered conversations and the soft shuffling of footsteps. Adorned with dark tapestries and flickering candles,and filled with weapons, such as daggers, crossbows, and poisons. A library of arcane knowledge, including forbidden texts on the art of assassination and dark magic, is hidden away in a secret chamber accessible only to the most trusted members of the guild.

Exit.Description: You detect a small opening covered by a heavy, stone-colored curtain.

Room.Name: Assassins Guidance
Room.Description: You have entered an austere, sparsely furnished space. The walls are made of rough-hewn stone, and the only light comes from a few flickering candles set in sconces. In the center of the room is a low table, surrounded by cushions, where the guildmaster sits cross-legged, ready to presiding over meetings and promotions. The table is strewn with scrolls, inkwells, and quills, as well as a selection of lethal weapons, such as daggers and poisons. The guildmasters throne is a simple wooden chair, unadorned except for a few engraved runes and symbols of ancient power. The atmosphere in the room is tense, as aspiring assassins waitubg anxiously for their turn to be evaluated by the guildmaster and potentially promoted to the next rank.

Room.Name: Secret Alcove
Room.Description: You see a dimly lit space with thick stone walls, an alcove hidden away for concealment. Adorned with dark tapestries and flickering candles, and filled with a library of arcane knowledge, including forbidden texts on the art of assassination and dark magic. This hidden secret chamber is accessible only to the most trusted members of the guild.

Exit.Description: You detect a small opening covered by a heavy, stone-colored curtain.

NPC.name: trainer
NPC.longDescription: The trainer stands here, ready to teach you his ways.

NPC.name: banker teller
NPC.description: The bank teller is a prim and proper figure. She has a demure smile, a small nose, and soft blue eyes that reflect her impeccable attention to detail. Her hair is styled in a fashionable updo, adorned with a delicate hat that adds to her sophisticated appearance. Her skin is a warm, creamy complexion, and she carries herself with grace and poise. She radiates an aura of efficiency and professionalism, her meticulous nature inspiring trust in her customers. Despite her quiet demeanor, she is well-versed in the intricacies of finance, and her expertise in managing money is second to none.
NPC.longDescription: A bank teller stands here, ready to take your gold.

NPC.name: cook Krolick
NPC.description: A big bearded, bare-armed man is covered in BBQ sauce up to his elbows.
NPC.longDescription: Krolick stands at the counter, his bare arms completely covered in BBQ sauce.

NPC.name: Weapon Master
NPC.description: A big barrel-chested man is behind the counter ready to sell you something sharp.
NPC.longDescription: A weapon master is here.

NPC.name: Clay the Tanner
NPC.description: A short man is behind the counter ready to sell you some gear.
NPC.longDescription: A tanner is here.

NPC.name: Beatrice the Weaver
NPC.description: An exotic looking woman is beckoning you over.
NPC.longDescription: A weaver is here.

NPC.name: Mack shopkeep
NPC.description: A Grumpy old man beckons you over.
NPC.longDescription: A shopkeeper is here.

NPC.name: Wendy shopkeep
NPC.description: A lovely lady beckons you over.
NPC.longDescription: Wendy the shopkeeper is here.

NPC.name: trainer warrior guildmaster
NPC.description: The warrior guildmaster is a formidable figure with a tall and athletic build. She has a sharp jawline, a straight nose, and intense brown eyes that seem to see right through you. Her hair is a deep auburn, styled in a practical braid that keeps it out of her face during combat. Her skin is weathered from years of training and battles, bearing the scars of her experiences as badges of honor. She exudes a confident and fearless energy, her presence commanding respect and inspiring courage in those around her. She stands tall and proud, ready to face any challenge that comes her way.
NPC.longDescription: The warrior guildmaster stands here, ready to teach you his ways.

NPC.name: warrior guard
NPC.description: A big, strong guild guard.
NPC.longDescription: A guard is here, protecting the warrior guild from intruders.

NPC.name: trainer paladin guildmaster
NPC.description: The paladin guildmaster is a tall and muscular figure with a chiseled jawline, a straight nose, and piercing green eyes. He has bright golden blonde hair styled in a regal manner. His presence commands respect and his bearing exudes a sense of justice and righteousness. His unwavering spirit and powerful aura inspire those around him to be brave and to fight for what is right.
NPC.longDescription: The paladin guildmaster stands here, ready to teach you his ways.

NPC.name: paladin guard
NPC.description: A big, strong guild guard.
NPC.longDescription: A guard is here, protecting the paladin guild from intruders.

NPC.name: trainer healer guildmaster
NPC.description: The healer guildmaster is a gentle and nurturing figure with a warm and kind demeanor. She has a round face, a small nose, and soft brown eyes that exude a sense of compassion. Her hair is a light brown, styled in a simple and elegant manner that allows her to move freely and attend to her patients. Her skin is a warm, creamy complexion, and she carries herself with grace and poise. She radiates an aura of calm and serenity, her gentle presence inspiring trust and comfort in those around her. Despite her petite stature, her mastery of the healing arts is undeniable, and she is revered by her fellow healers.
NPC.longDescription: The healer guildmaster stands here, ready to teach you his ways.

NPC.name: healer guard
NPC.description: A short, skinny guild guard.
NPC.longDescription: A guard is here, protecting the healer guild from intruders.

NPC.name: trainer thief guildmaster
NPC.description: The thief guildmaster is a slender and nimble figure with a quick wit and a charming smile. He has a sharp jawline, a crooked nose, and sparkling brown eyes that seem to always be on the lookout for his next big score. His hair is a shaggy mop of black, styled in a manner that adds to his roguish charm. He moves with a feline grace, his confidence and cunning evident in every step. Despite his sometimes questionable methods, he has a charismatic personality and a silver tongue that makes him well-liked by his fellow thieves.
NPC.longDescription: The thief guildmaster stands here, ready to teach you his ways.

NPC.name: thief guard
NPC.description: A short, stocky guild guard.
NPC.longDescription: A guard is here, protecting the thief guild from intruders.

NPC.name: trainer mage guildmaster
NPC.description: The mage guildmaster is a serene and regal figure with an ethereal beauty. She has a delicate jawline, a straight nose, and piercing blue eyes that seem to shimmer with an inner light. Her hair is a shining silver, styled in an elaborate up-do that adds to her stately appearance. Her skin is a warm, creamy complexion, and she carries herself with grace and poise. She radiates an aura of calm and confidence, her gentle presence inspiring a sense of peace and security in those around her. Despite her quiet demeanor, her vast knowledge and mastery of magic is undeniable.
NPC.longDescription: The mage guildmaster stands here, ready to teach you her ways.

NPC.name: mage guard
NPC.description: A short, skinny guild guard.
NPC.longDescription: A guard is here, protecting the mage guild from intruders.

NPC.name: healer
NPC.description: Although retired from adventuring, the healer still lends a hand. Type 'heal' to see a listing of spells.
NPC.longDescription: A healer is here, selling spells.

NPC.name: cityguard guard
NPC.description: The city guard stands tall and imposing on the streets, their broad shoulders and sturdy frame making them a reassuring presence for the citizens. They have a strong jawline, a straight nose, and piercing green eyes that reflect their vigilance and attention to detail. Their hair is a short crop, styled in a practical manner that doesn't distract from their duties. Their skin is rough and tanned from the sun, bearing the marks of a life spent outdoors. They carry themselves with confidence and authority, their posture straight and their gait steady. Despite their intimidating appearance, they are known to have a stern but fair demeanor, earning the respect of the people they serve and protect.
NPC.longDescription: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate alertly.

NPC.name: merchant Sid
NPC.description: A big bearded man is beckons you over to look at his wares.
NPC.longDescription: Sid stands at the counter, waiting for your order.

NPC.name: boy
NPC.description: He is young and close-cropped and looks quite happy.
NPC.longDescription: A pet shop boy is here, humming gently.

NPC.name: kitten cat pet
NPC.description: The kitten looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.
NPC.longDescription: A small loyal kitten is here.

NPC.name: puppy dog pet
NPC.description: The puppy looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.
NPC.longDescription: A small loyal puppy is here.

NPC.name: beagle dog pet
NPC.description: The beagle looks like a fierce fighter.
NPC.longDescription: A small, quick, loyal beagle is here.

NPC.name: rottweiler dog pet
NPC.description: The rottweiler looks like a strong, fierce fighter.
NPC.longDescription: A large, loyal rottweiler is here.

NPC.name: wolf pet
NPC.description: The wolf looks like a strong, fearless fighter.
NPC.longDescription: A large, trained wolf is here.

NPC.name: eagle bird pet
NPC.description: The eagle looks like a strong fierce fighter.
NPC.longDescription: A loyal eagle circles overhead.

NPC.name: lion pet
NPC.description: The great lion looks very fierce.
NPC.longDescription: A large, faithful lion is here.

NPC.name: tiger pet
NPC.description: The large, striped tiger looks like a savage fighter.
NPC.longDescription: A great, loyal tiger is here.

NPC.name: captain guard
NPC.description: A big, strong guard captain.
NPC.longDescription: The captain is here, scheduling the guard rotation for the day.

NPC.name: lieutenant guard
NPC.description: An angry guard captain.
NPC.longDescription: An angry looking guard lieutenant glares at you.

NPC.name: trainer bard guildmaster
NPC.description: The guildmaster is a tall and regal looking figure, with long flowing silver hair and piercing green eyes. He wears a garb of rich purple and gold, adorned with intricate musical symbols embroidered along the hem and sleeves. A lute is hung from a strap across his back, and a small harp is clasped in his hand. A charming smile graces his lips, and his voice is like honey, soothing the soul and captivating all who hear it. He exuded a sense of wisdom and leadership, and his mere presence commands respect from all those around.
NPC.longDescription: The bard guildmaster stands here, ready to teach you his ways.

NPC.name: bard guard
NPC.description: The guard is a formidable figure, standing tall and proud at the entrance to the bard's guild. She is dressed in gleaming silver armor, adorned with musical notes etched in gold. Her long cape, made of the finest velvet, flows in the breeze, while her helmet is shaped like a lyre, symbolizing the music she protects. In one hand, she holds a wooden dagger, the blade made of a magical wood that never breaks and the point shining like a star. In the other hand, she carrys a lute, ready to strum a tune if needed.
NPC.longDescription: A guard is here, protecting the bards guild from intruders.

NPC.name: merchant bard
NPC.description: Dressed in ornate robes of emerald green and golden yellow, with a lute hanging from a strap across their back, this traveling bard exudes an air of confidence and pride. His long, curly hair is tied back in a messy bun, revealing a face full of character and charisma. He is surrounded by a collection of instruments of all shapes and sizes.
NPC.longDescription: A traveling bard sits here, displaying his wares.

NPC.name: assassin guard
NPC.description: A tall, agile guild guard.
NPC.longDescription: A guard is here, protecting the assassin guild from intruders.

NPC.name: trainer assassin guildmaster
NPC.description: The guildmaster is dressed in a simple yet elegant black robe, unadorned except for a few gold threads woven into the hem and cuffs. The robe is made of a soft, supple material that allows the guildmaster to move quickly and silently when necessary. His face is partially obscured by a black hood, which casts his features into shadow and conceals his identity from prying eyes. His eyes are piercing and intense, able to see through lies and deception with ease. His movements are fluid and graceful, yet also deadly and precise, reflecting the deadly art of assassination that he hasmastered. The guildmaster is a figure of fear and respect, inspiring both loyalty and terror among his followers, and commanding a dark and powerful presence that few could match.
NPC.longDescription: The assassin guildmaster stands here, ready to teach you his ways.

NPC.name: lizard tail
NPC.description: The detached lizard tail is squirming and contorting as if it still has a life of its own.
NPC.longDescription: The squirming tail is here, recently detached from a lizard.

NPC.name: wolf
NPC.description: A large, muscular wolf with pointed ears, sharp teeth and claws and piercing eyes is here. Its fur a shade of gray with brown sprinkled in, with a streamlined body built for speed and agility.
NPC.longDescription: A vicious wolf is here, serving its master.

NPC.name: serpent
NPC.description: A long, sinuous serpent with smooth scales and a flickering tongue is here. Its body is lithe and flexible, able to move swiftly and gracefully through the underbrush. Its scales are a shade of green with black spots, and it has a triangular head with sharp fangs. The serpent's eyes appear to be be keen and watchful, and it moves with a fluid, serpentine grace.
NPC.longDescription: A vicious serpent is here, serving its master.

NPC.name: bear
NPC.description: A massive, hulking bear with shaggy fur, sharp claws, and a powerful build is here. Its fur is a shade of brown, and it has a broad, rounded head with small ears and snout. Its eyes would are deep-set and watchful, and it moves with a lumbering, yet surprisingly quick gait. Despite its size and strength, the bear seems to possess a certain grace and fluidity of movement, as well as a primal, untamed energy.
NPC.longDescription: A viscious bear is here, serving its master.

NPC.name: owl
NPC.description: A vicious owl with sharp talons and beak are prominently displayed, ready to strike at any moment. Its eyes are intense and focused, scanning the surroundings for potential prey. Its feathers are dark and sleek, allowing it to move swiftly and silently through the air. Overall, the vicious owl exudes a sense of power and danger, both feared and respected by those who encountered it.
NPC.longDescription: A vicious owl is here, serving its master.

NPC.name: trainer shapeshifter guildmaster
NPC.description: The guildmaster of the shapeshifters guild is a wise and mysterious figure, known simply as the Elder. Whether male or female, their appearance is that of a person who has lived many lives, with eyes that seem to hold the knowledge of the ages. The Elder is revered by all who enter the guild, their words carrying the weight of centuries of shapeshifting lore and wisdom. They have dedicated their life to the art of shapeshifting and are a master of all animal forms, able to shift effortlessly from one creature to another. The Elder is patient and compassionate, yet fierce in their determination to protect the balance between humans and nature. Their guidance is sought by all shapeshifters who seek to deepen their understanding of the natural world and hone their shapeshifting skills.
NPC.longDescription: The shapeshifter guildmaster stands here, ready to teach you its ways.

NPC.name: shapeshifter guard
NPC.description: A short, skinny guild guard.
NPC.longDescription: A guard is here, protecting the shapeshifter guild from intruders.

NPC.name: Seraphel Guardian
NPC.description: Radiant, with golden locks that shimmer like sunlight. Her eyes are a serene shade of azure, reflecting her calm and steadfast nature. Clad in gleaming silver armor, she carries a sword that emanates a soft, ethereal glow, signifying her divine allegiance.
NPC.longDescription: Seraphel, Guardian of Light, is here, seeking out Ravenshadow.

NPC.name: Ravenshadow Chaosbringer
NPC.description: Tall, wiry, with jet-black hair that cascades over a pale, gaunt face. Eyes are a deep shade of crimson, almost resembling pools of blood. Wears dark, tattered robes that flutter as if caught in a ceaseless, stormy wind. His presence is accompanied by the eerie cawing of unseen ravens.
NPC.longDescription: Ravenshadow, The Chaosbringer is here, causing havoc.

Item.Name: donation pit
Item.LongDescription: The donation pit lies on the ground here.
Item.Description: A donation pit occupies a space in front of the altar.

Item.Name: trunk

Item.Name: plain staff
Item.LongDescription: A plain looking staff lies here.
Item.Description: This staff looks pretty ordinary except for a couple of runes engraved on it.

Item.Name: wand
Item.LongDescription: A wand lies here.
Item.Description: A simple looking wand. Surely you can figure out how to use it.

Item.Name: flaming sword
Item.LongDescription: A flaming sword with a sharkskin grip is here.
Item.Description: A flaming short sword with a sharkskin grip looks very sharp.

Item.Name: polearm fauchard
Item.LongDescription: A fauchard with a sharkskin grip is here.
Item.Description: A fauchard with a sharkskin grip looks very sharp.

Item.Name: sharp dagger
Item.LongDescription: A sharp dagger with a sharkskin grip is here.
Item.Description: A sharp dagger with a sharkskin grip looks deadly.

Item.Name: gnarled branch
Item.LongDescription: a gnarled branch is here.
Item.Description: A gnarled staff with enlayed with gems looks very hardy.

Item.Name: viper whip
Item.LongDescription: a coiled viper whip is here.
Item.Description: A coiled viper whip looks alive and ready to strike.

Item.Name: fountain water
Item.LongDescription: A small white fountain gushes forth here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is very nice. Made from fine white marble.

Item.Name: sword standard
Item.LongDescription: You see a standard issue sword here.
Item.Description: You see a sword of great craftsmanship.

Item.Name: vest standard

Item.Name: flaming halberd
Item.LongDescription: A flaming halberd with a sharkskin grip is here.
Item.Description: A flaming halberd with a sharkskin grip looks very dangerous.

Item.Name: frost axe
Item.LongDescription: A frost axe with a sharkskin grip is here.
Item.Description: A frost axe with a sharkskin grip looks very dangerous.

Item.Name: chest
Item.LongDescription: The chest lies on the ground here.
Item.Description: An ancient looking chest is covered with cobwebs.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A small brass key lies here.
Item.Description: It is a small, simple brass key with no inscriptions or marks of any kind.

Item.Name: silver coins
Item.LongDescription: A lot of silver is here.
Item.Description: Looks like at least a thousand coins.

Item.Name: potion flight flying
Item.LongDescription: A magical potion lies on the ground.
Item.Description: A label on the side of this potion reads "quaff to fly!"

Item.Name: silver flute
Item.LongDescription: A silver flute has been left here.
Item.Description: The silver flute is an intricately crafted instrument that exudes elegance and beauty. It is long and slender, with a gleaming silver body that shimmers in the light. The flute is adorned with delicate engravings that spiral up its length, depicting mythical creatures and enchanted forests. The keys of the flute are studded with tiny gems that sparkle like stars, adding a touch of magic to its appearance. The silver flute is a visually stunning object, evoking a sense of wonder and enchantment in those who behold it.

Item.Name: silver mace
Item.LongDescription: a silver mace is here.
Item.Description: A silver mace with a hand-wrapped grip looks very deadly.

Item.Name: silver lute
Item.LongDescription: A silver lute has been left here.
Item.Description: The silver lute is an intricately crafted instrument that exudes elegance and beauty. The silver lute is a visually stunning object, evoking a sense of wonder and enchantment in those who behold it.

Item.Name: wooden dagger
Item.LongDescription: A wooden dagger has been left here.
Item.Description: The wooden dagger is an intricately crafted weapon that exudes elegance and beauty. The blade is made of a magical wood that never breaks and the point is shining like a star.

Item.Name: ivory harp
Item.LongDescription: A fine ivory harp lies here, glinting with beauty.
Item.Description: This ivory harp is a work of art as well as musical instruments, due to its intricate design and ornate embellishments. Designed with flamboyant bard in mind, it would be best displayed while wielded in courts and palaces.

Item.Name: coral harp
Item.LongDescription: A large coral harp lies here.
Item.Description: The body of a coral harp is carved from a single piece of coral and decorated with intricate designs. The animal gut strings should provide a soft and sweet sound with a delicate quality that is perfect for playing traditional or classical music. This instrument would be appropriate for religious ceremonies or any other entertainment purposes.

Item.Name: brass horn
Item.LongDescription: A crude brass horn lies here.
Item.Description: This brass horn is in the form of a long and conical tube with a flared bell at one end. It belongs to the family of brass instruments and is known for its rich, warm, and powerful sound. It is polished to a high shine, which enhances its appearance and contributes to the warm, rich sound it can produce.

Item.Name: violin
Item.LongDescription: Someone's violin is lying here.
Item.Description: The body of this violin is made of spruce wood for the top, while the back, sides, and neck are made of maple. The top is shaped like an hourglass, with the middle portion being slightly bulging, and both the upper and lower bouts being slightly curved. The back is arched, and the neck has a fingerboard for the player to press their fingers on to change the pitch of the strings.

Item.Name: key gold
Item.LongDescription: A small gold key lies here.
Item.Description: It is a small, simple gold key with no inscriptions or marks of any kind.

Item.Name: glass cabinet
Item.LongDescription: The glass cabinet lies against the stone wall.
Item.Description: The secret glass cabinet houses an assortment of daggers, each with its own unique design and history. The cabinet's dimly lit interior creates an ominous atmosphere that befits the deadly nature of the weapons on display. The daggers themselves are finely crafted, with intricate engravings and sharp blades, revealing the skill and artistry of the craftsmen who made them. One can only imagine the countless clandestine missions these daggers have been used for and the blood they have spilled in the hands of their anonymous wielders.

Item.Name: glass dagger
Item.LongDescription: A glass dagger has been left here.
Item.Description: This glass dagger appears delicate and fragile at first glance, but upon closer inspection, it is clear that the blade is made from a durable, high-quality see-through material. The blade, smooth and transparent, has no visible cracks or flaws. The handle is adorned with ornate silver engravings, adding to its delicate yet elegant appearance.

Item.Name: diamond dagger
Item.LongDescription: A diamond dagger has been left here.
Item.Description: This diamond dagger is a true marvel of craftsmanship. The blade is made entirely of diamond, shimmering in the dim light of the room. The handle is fashioned from a combination of gold and silver, with intricate engravings depicting scenes from medieval history. The weight of the dagger is substantial, and it is clear that it is meant for use as a deadly weapon rather than a mere ornament.

Item.Name: whalebone dagger
Item.LongDescription: A whalebone dagger has been left here.
Item.Description: This whale bone dagger is perhaps the most unique blade ever seen. The blade is made from a polished whale bone, which has been sharpened to a razor-sharp edge. The handle is made from a combination of whale bone and walrus ivory, with intricate carvings depicting mythical creatures and ancient symbols. The dagger has an almost mystical quality to it, seeming to hold within it the power of the sea from which it was derived.

Item.Name: pick tool
Item.LongDescription: A strange looking tool has been left here.
Item.Description: This strange looking tool made from carved whale bone has many intricate parts, some stationary and others movable. The handle is made whale bone and walrus ivory and has an unusual quality to it, and only one specifically trained in its use would be able to benefit from its secrets.
